TopicTitle: Yet more mentions by Real Rocket Scientists

Articles.Content: So it seems UKSA are looking for a new chairperson...

They missed a real opportunity with the acronym for Space Technology Advisory Committee. If it was Committee for Advising on Technology for Space the position would be easier to fill, who wouldn't want to be the Chairperson of CATS?

> 
> They missed a real opportunity with the acronym for Space Technology Advisory Committee. If it was Committee for Advising on Technology for Space the position would be easier to fill, who wouldn't want to be the Chairperson of CATS?

It works better the other way, where the acronym almost spells 'stack,' the word for a vertical group of serial stages.

-Duxwing

> 
> Chairperson of CATS

![1nyVayo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/1nyVayo.jpg)

HOW ARE YOU, GENTLEMEN!! ALL YOUR SPACE ARE BELONG TO US.
